column1: text
Remember the five simple rules to be happy: Free your heart from hatred. Free your mind from worries. Live simply. Give more. Expect less.
Disappointments were not meant to destroy you. They were meant to strengthen you and give you fortitude to accomplish your God-given destiny.
Integrity is the most valuable and respected quality of leadership. Always keep your word.
Life is short, live it. Love is rare, grab it. Anger is bad, dump it. Fear is awful, face it. Memories are sweet, cherish them.
Some people will never change, and you have to accept that.
Spending today complaining about yesterday won't make tomorrow any better.
One of the keys to success is having the discipline to do something, even when you don't feel like doing it.
Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical. Expect more than others think is possible.
Sometimes you have to get knocked down lower than you've ever been, to stand up taller than you than you ever were.
The longer you have to wait for something, the more you will appreciate it when it finally arrives.
Always put in your best effort, you never know who is watching.
The simplest way to stay happy is to let go of everything that makes you sad.
To believe means to hope for the best, endure the stress, passing every test and accepting nothing less.
Always put your fears behind you and your dreams in front of you.
The more you hide your feelings, the more they show. The more you deny your feelings, the more they grow.
We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
I want to be the best. I want to be a great. I want to be feared. I want to be unforgettable. I want to be unforgivable. I WANT TO BE ME.
Don't let negative people hold you back.
Believe in yourself even when no one else does. If someone tells you that you can't do it, prove them wrong.
Don't regret the past, just learn from it.
Don't allow the past to keep you stuck. Learn from it, let go, and move on.
Let your dreams be bigger than your fears, your actions louder than your words, and your faith stronger than your feelings.
Whatever you're facing today, keep going. Keep moving. Keep hoping. Keep pressing on. There is victory on the other side!
Actions speak louder than words. We can apologize over and over, but if our actions don't change, the words become meaningless.
Don't wish for it, work for it.
Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing ever. But to hold it together when everyone else thinks you'd fall apart is true strength.
Life's not about the mistakes we've made. It's about the lessons we've learned and the friends we've gained.
You can only try your best. And if they can't appreciate that, it's their fault, not yours.
Hope for the best, prepare for the worst, and take whatever comes your way.
Keep the Faith. The most amazing things in life tend to happen right at the moment you're about to give up hope.
Losers are those whose words are bigger than actions. Winners are those whose actions are bigger than words.
Learn to trust the journey, even when you do not understand it.
Faith makes all things possible. Hope makes all things work. Love makes all things beautiful. May you have all three.
The best thing in life is finding someone who knows all your flaws, mistakes, and weaknesses, and still thinks you're completely amazing.
Pain makes you stronger, tears make you braver, and heartbreaks make you wiser, so thank the past for a better future.
Don't let someone else's opinion change how you feel about something. Stand by what you believe in.
I've made lots of mistakes in my past...but if you judge me on what I did in my past, then you have no reason being in my future.
If you want me in your life, put me there. I shouldn't be fighting for a spot.
Each story has an ending.... But sometimes endings are just a new beginning.
Every single day you should wake up and commit yourself to becoming a better person.
God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.
Choose your friends with caution, plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
Strength is when you have so much to cry for but you prefer to smile instead.
What comes easy, won't always last. What will last, won't always come easy.
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop true strength.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
If you want to conquer fear, don't sit at home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
Yes it may be painful if you keep pushing yourself, but it hurts a lot more if you quit.
When we pray God hears more than we say, answers more than we ask, and gives more than we can imagine in His own time and own way.
Impossible is not a fact, it's an opinion.
I love who I am, I'm happy of who I am, and I'm proud to say that.
It is better to look ahead and prepare than to look back and regret.
There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, there are no limits.
Life is too short to give another minute to anyone or anything that doesn't make you happy.
If God doesn't give you what you want, it isn't what you need.
My mission: be so busy loving my life that I have no time for hate, regret, worrying, fret, or fear.
Beautiful things happen when you distance yourself from negativity.
Surround yourself with positive people who will support you when it rains, not just when it shines.
Confidence is the key.  If you don't believe in yourself, then nobody will
Keep calm and don't care what others think.
